name: Double or Nothing! (Duel Links Skill)
text:
(This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
You must begin the Duel with an Extra Deck that contains no other monsters other than Xyz Monsters.
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect:
During your Main Phase, if you control a "Number 98: Antitopian" or a LIGHT "Utopia" or "Utopic" Xyz Monster in your Monster Zone; Add 1 "Double or Nothing!" to your hand from your Deck, and if you do, shuffle 1 card from your hand into your Deck.
This Skill can be used once per Duel.
